content: We think going forward in Q1 because of the way we price progressively in Q3, early Q4, those would come down more in the 40% to 50% range on our now money market rate and still the time deposit betas because of the nature of the market, still probably going to remain 50% range for Q1, and then I'll let Matt talk about really the betas for the balance of the year, what we're seeing.
